name: Parry Sword Adventure
description:
Parry Sword Adventure

is a 2d pixel art adventure game based on the mechanics of returning enemy bullets with your sword

Help Alex find his friend who has been captured, explore different environments, mysterious levels, defeat enemies that get in your way and capture the gems

Controls
  1.  Move:  Arrow Keys 
  2.  Jump:  Space 
  3.  Z:  Sword
  4.  X:  Shield 
  5.  C:  Interact 
  6.  V:  Drop Object
Development

This is the first game developed by Tiny Red Rhombus, Game Designer: Osiel, Pixel Art Tilesets: Anokolisa, GUI: unTied
